column4: I'm trying to run third-party software that fails with "error while loading shared libraries: libGLw.so.1". I can't find this library with apt-file -- how can I install it in feisty?
i'm not on ubuntu, but perhaps you can search the forums for that file (it will be a libgl package i think)
try the scp command locally (scp somefile sanrag@localhost:) -- see if it "arrives". If it does, the problem is with the sending machine.
